LightningComponentBundle.description: Embeds Nearmap MapBrowser to display aerial imagery for the contact's address location

property.name: height
property.label: Map Height (pixels)
property.description: Height of the map display in pixels (only used if Show Embedded Map is enabled)

property.name: showIframe
property.label: Show Embedded Map
property.description: Enable to show an embedded map preview (may require repeated login due to browser security). Disabled by default - users can open maps in a new window instead.

property.name: googleMapsApiKey
property.label: Google Maps API Key (Optional)
property.description: Optional: Add your Google Maps API key here to enable Google Geocoding as a fallback when free geocoding fails. Use the same key from your Google Street View component.
